articles.title: House prices fall for the first time in nearly two years as rising interest rates bite - ABC News
articles.description: Australian home prices have fallen nationally for the first time in at least 20 months, according to two leading monthly indices, although many parts of the country are still in a property boom.
articles.content:

articles.title: Platform for isolation and characterization of SARS-CoV-2 variants enables rapid characterization of Omicron in Australia - Nature.com
articles.description: A platform developed for rapid isolation of SARS-CoV-2 variants also facilitates the characterization of variant immune evasion and viral fitness. The platform enabled rapid detection of the Omicron variant in samples of the first cases in Australia.
